text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Don't get so excited Ninny. The surges of COVID19 will require shutting down more areas, and numbers will rise & rise. Time has run out. Congratulations on causing 128000 deaths President Pandemic. We won't forget his lies or yours Ninny.
